summary: With 20 years of experience in the motor trade, currently employed at BMW Vertu York, I’m seeking a career change into tech. Since 2020, I’ve been learning and trading in the forex market and discovered a passion for coding along the way. I began with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS before transitioning to Python and AWS, where I’ve developed multiple small test projects to explore new services and understand how they integrate. I’m eager to enter the tech industry, continue expanding my skills, and apply my hands-on learning approach to real-world projects.
personalDescription: I’m an open-minded problem solver who thrives on finding innovative approaches and refining processes for greater efficiency. With a strong inclination toward structure and organization, I excel in small group settings but also contribute effectively to larger teams when confident in the subject matter. I enjoy creating small test projects to explore new technologies and see how services fit together, as I believe hands-on experimentation is the best way to learn. My passion for teaching drives me to make complex ideas accessible, using clear explanations and relatable metaphors to support different learning styles.
goals: Deepen my coding knowledge and broaden proficiency across multiple languages through real-world projects.
Continue building strong Python skills while refining my ability to adapt and debug in Bash, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, JSON, and PowerShell.
Strengthen my ‘big picture’ approach, designing, connecting, and delivering complete systems, often leveraging AI tools to speed development.
Regularly create small test projects to experiment with new services and understand how they integrate.
Secure a role in the tech industry through hands-on projects and internships.
Build the skills needed to work remotely, allowing me to continue developing personal projects from home.
One day, teach technology in my own style, accessible, honest, and driven by relatable metaphors.
languagesNote: I focus on the bigger picture — designing, connecting, and shipping complete systems. I use AI to accelerate coding while I keep improving my language depth.

projects.name: GPT Assistant
projects.blurb: AI-powered assistant combining OpenAI's GPT with a serverless AWS backend. Includes calendar event detection and image uploads to S3 via a clean React UI.
projects.impact: Demonstrates end-to-end GPT integration and serves as a foundation for lightweight AI agents.

projects.name: Finance Tracker
projects.blurb: Parses PDF bank statements and detects recurring patterns like wages or rent using Python and pandas.
projects.impact: Cut financial reconciliation time from hours to minutes via automated categorization.

projects.name: Online CV Website (ATS-Friendly)
projects.blurb: Built a modular, JSON-driven online CV hosted on AWS S3 and delivered via CloudFront, designed for both human readability and ATS compatibility.
projects.impact: Provides a clean, mobile-friendly, and ATS-optimized personal website that can be easily updated by editing JSON — no code or redeploys needed.
